attributes.background:
Thousands of people across the UK get relief from CBD products every day and the MHRA are planning to ban their sale as of 27th February 2019. 

Whilst we welcome regulation and standardization we implore the MHRA not to ban/restrict sale and access to CBD products whilst they issue licenses.
